author: Ahnaf30e
description:
Adds expressions to convert text to a binary representation and back.
The `UnicodeConversion::ReverseUnicode(string, range, base)` string expression can be used for basic obfuscation of data.
name: UnicodeConversion
shortDescription: Provides conversion tools for Ascii and Unicode characters.

eventsFunctions.description: Reverses the unicode of a string with a base.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Reverse the unicode of a string
eventsFunctions.name: ReverseUnicode

parameters.description: Range of unicode characters (Put 16 here to support the most characters if you put 2 in the base)
parameters.name: Range

eventsFunctions.description: Converts a unicode representation into String with a base.
eventsFunctions.name: UnicodeToText

parameters.description: The unicode to convert to String
parameters.name: String

eventsFunctions.description: Converts a string into unicode representation with a base.
eventsFunctions.name: TextToUnicode

parameters.description: The string to convert to unicode
parameters.name: String
